alert.note: Alert for Delta; Dickinson; Iron; Southern Schoolcraft (Michigan) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued January 12 at 3:23PM EST until January 13 at 7:00PM EST by NWS Marquette
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 7 PM EST /6 PM CST/ SATURDAY... * WHAT...Heavy snow. Additional snow accumulations of 6 to 14 inches. The highest accumulations will be across northern Dickinson and Delta county. Winds gusting as high as 40 mph. * WHERE...Iron, Dickinson, Delta and Southern Schoolcraft Counties. * WHEN...Until 7 PM EST /6 PM CST/ Saturday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult to impossible. Patchy blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. The hazardous conditions could impact the evening commute. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Blizzard conditions will be possible tonight into early Saturday morning near the Lake Michigan shoreline. Additional lake enhanced to lake effect snow continues Saturday night into Sunday. Mainly light accumulations are possible across the southern UP, but plowable snow will be possible in northern Delta county.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency.
